parameter.name: named
parameter.description: Select only calendar entries with a name matching the exact string given.

parameter.name: kind
parameter.description: Whether you want to return only tasks or only events. Must be either task or event. Leave out for both.

parameter.name: ownerId
parameter.description: The calendar entries that are owned by owner_id.

parameter.name: completed
parameter.description: If true, return only completed events.

parameter.name: incomplete
parameter.description: If true, return only incomplete events.

parameter.name: late
parameter.description: If true, return only late items.

parameter.name: today
parameter.description: If true, return items due today.

parameter.name: tomorrow
parameter.description: If true, return items due tomorrow.

parameter.name: thisWeek
parameter.description: If true, return items due this week.

parameter.name: nextWeek
parameter.description: If true, return items due next week.

parameter.name: future
parameter.description: If true, return items due after next week.

parameter.name: withinFromDate
parameter.description: The calendar entries that occur within the start and end time provided.

parameter.name: withinToDate
parameter.description: Paired with conditions[within][start].

parameter.name: startingAt
parameter.description: Select calendar entries matching the exact start time given. Most datetime formats will be parsed correctly.

parameter.name: endingAt
parameter.description: Select calendar entries matching the exact end time given. Most datetime formats will be parsed correctly.

parameter.name: someday
parameter.description: Return calendar tasks with no due date.

parameter.name: recurrencesOf
parameter.description: Pass in the id of the base event in a series, and get all other events in the series.

parameter.name: nonRecurring
parameter.description: Return only events that aren't part of a series.

parameter.name: baseEntries
parameter.description: Return only events that are the first (base) event in a series.

parameter.name: includeInactive
parameter.description: Return entries marked as 'inactive', which are functionally equivalent to being deleted. Events that are part of a series that are deleted are actually just marked inactive, so that the entire series can be replicated accurately on other systems.

parameter.name: calendarEntryModified
parameter.description: You can pass in a datetime range to qualify searches based upon the calendar entry's updated_at field.

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: No. of the page to retrieve when results are paginated.

parameter.name: perPage
parameter.description: Entries to list per page when results are paginated.

parameter.name: searchId
parameter.description: Search calendar entries by previously saved filter with given search_id.

parameter.name: sort
parameter.description: Field to sort the calendar entries.
